General.Description: USDT is a cryptocurrency asset released on the Bitcoin blockchain via the Omni class protocol. Each USDT unit supported by a US Dollar is held in Tether Limited's reserves and can be used through the Tether Platform. USDT can be transferred, stored, spent, like bitcoins or any other cryptocurrency.
General.Features: The main purpose of the USDT is to facilitate the exchange of currencies, which helps holders of USDT token equivalents to USD. In addition, Tether enables you to trade virtual currencies more easily, more quickly, helping you reduce the time and cost of investing in bitcoin.
General.Technology: USDT Token is released on Blockchain technology, through an Omni protocol layer. USDT provides an alternative to Proof of Methods of Payment affordability by providing proof of the Reserve Process. In Tether Proof of Reserves, the amount of USDT in circulation can be easily checked on the Bitcoin blockchain through the tools provided at Omnichest.info.
